alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Fairfield; Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:22PM EDT until September 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Fairfield County in central South Carolina... West central Lee County in central South Carolina... Central Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... Eastern Richland County in central South Carolina... Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 621 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Springdale to near Elgin to Congaree National Park to 6 miles south of Sandy Run, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. Numerous wind damage has been reported! SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sumter, Camden, McEntire Air Base, Lake Wateree Dam, Shaw Air Base, St. Matthews, Eastover, Lugoff, Westville, Congaree National Park, Oakland, Elgin, Longtown, Gadsden, Goodale State Park, Dinkins Mill, Spring Hill, North Towne Square Shopping Center, and Fort Motte. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 83 and 105. Interstate 26 between mile markers 134 and 136. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Fairfield; Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter
